tasks.title: Setup Project Repository and CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository and configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment.
tasks.details:
1. Create a new GitHub repository for the SkyFi MCP server.
2. Set up a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment.
3. Configure the pipeline to run tests on pull requests and deploy to a demo instance on merge to main.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the CI/CD pipeline triggers on pull requests and merges, and that tests are executed successfully.

subtasks.title: Create GitHub Repository
subtasks.description: Initialize a new GitHub repository for the SkyFi MCP server.
subtasks.details: Set up a new repository on GitHub with appropriate naming conventions and access permissions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify repository creation and access permissions.

subtasks.title: Configure GitHub Actions for CI/CD
subtasks.description: Set up GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment processes.
subtasks.details: Create a GitHub Actions workflow file to define the CI/CD pipeline steps for testing and deployment.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure the workflow file is correctly formatted and triggers on push events.

subtasks.title: Implement Automated Testing in CI/CD
subtasks.description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline to run automated tests on pull requests.
subtasks.details: Modify the workflow file to include steps for running tests on pull requests using a testing framework.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that tests are executed successfully on pull requests.

subtasks.title: Set Up Deployment to Demo Instance
subtasks.description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline to deploy to a demo instance on merge to main.
subtasks.details: Add deployment steps to the workflow file to deploy the application to a demo environment upon merging to the main branch.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that deployment occurs correctly on merges to main.

subtasks.title: Test CI/CD Pipeline Functionality
subtasks.description: Verify the entire CI/CD pipeline for correct functionality.
subtasks.details: Perform end-to-end testing of the CI/CD pipeline to ensure all steps execute as expected.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the pipeline by creating pull requests and merging to main, ensuring all actions trigger correctly.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider breaking down the CI/CD pipeline setup into more granular steps, such as environment configuration, secret management, and deployment strategy.

tasks.title: Implement MCP Protocol Handlers
tasks.description: Develop the core MCP protocol handlers to manage communication between AI agents and the SkyFi MCP server.
tasks.details:
1. Use Express.js to set up the server and define routes for MCP protocol endpoints.
2. Implement handlers for `tools/list` and `tools/call` following the MCP specification.
3. Ensure proper error handling and response formatting according to the MCP spec.
tasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests to validate that the MCP protocol handlers correctly process requests and return expected responses.

subtasks.title: Set Up Express.js Server
subtasks.description: Initialize an Express.js server for MCP protocol.
subtasks.details: Install Express.js and set up a basic server structure with necessary middleware.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure server starts without errors.

subtasks.title: Define MCP Protocol Routes
subtasks.description: Create routes for MCP protocol endpoints.
subtasks.details: Define routes for `tools/list` and `tools/call` in the Express.js server.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify routes are accessible and return 404 for unimplemented handlers.

subtasks.title: Implement `tools/list` Handler
subtasks.description: Develop the handler for the `tools/list` endpoint.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to handle requests to `tools/list` and return a list of available tools as per MCP spec.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests to validate response structure and data.

subtasks.title: Implement `tools/call` Handler
subtasks.description: Develop the handler for the `tools/call` endpoint.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to process requests to `tools/call` and execute specified tool actions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests to ensure correct tool execution and response.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling and Response Formatting
subtasks.description: Ensure proper error handling and response formatting for MCP handlers.
subtasks.details: Add error handling and format responses according to MCP specifications for all handlers.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with invalid inputs to ensure errors are handled gracefully.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider detailing the error handling and response formatting further, possibly breaking it into separate subtasks for different types of errors or responses.

tasks.title: Integrate SkyFi API Client
tasks.description: Develop a client to interact with the SkyFi Public API for data retrieval and order management.
tasks.details:
1. Use Axios to create an HTTP client for the SkyFi API.
2. Implement functions to handle authentication, search, pricing, ordering, and monitoring.
3. Ensure retry logic and error handling are in place for API requests.
tasks.testStrategy: Mock the SkyFi API in integration tests to verify that the client functions correctly handle various API responses.

subtasks.title: Set Up Axios HTTP Client
subtasks.description: Initialize Axios to interact with the SkyFi API.
subtasks.details: Create an Axios instance with base URL and default headers for the SkyFi API.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify Axios instance configuration with mock requests.

subtasks.title: Implement Authentication Function
subtasks.description: Develop a function to handle API authentication.
subtasks.details: Use OAuth2 for authentication and store tokens securely.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test authentication with valid and invalid credentials.

subtasks.title: Develop API Interaction Functions
subtasks.description: Create functions for search, pricing, ordering, and monitoring.
subtasks.details: Implement functions to call API endpoints for data retrieval and order management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Mock API responses to test function outputs.

subtasks.title: Add Retry Logic and Error Handling
subtasks.description: Implement retry logic and error handling for API requests.
subtasks.details: Use Axios interceptors to manage retries and handle errors gracefully.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate network errors and verify retry mechanism.

subtasks.title: Integrate and Test SkyFi API Client
subtasks.description: Integrate all components and perform end-to-end testing.
subtasks.details: Combine all functions and test the complete client against the SkyFi API.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct integration tests with mocked API to ensure full functionality.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider expanding the error handling and retry logic into separate subtasks for different types of API errors or network issues.

tasks.title: Develop Authentication and Security Middleware
tasks.description: Implement middleware for authentication and security, including API key validation and rate limiting.
tasks.details:
1. Create middleware to validate SkyFi API keys provided by users.
2. Implement rate limiting using a library like express-rate-limit.
3. Ensure all communications are secured with TLS.
tasks.testStrategy: Test middleware with various scenarios, including invalid API keys and exceeding rate limits, to ensure proper security measures are enforced.

subtasks.title: Design API Key Validation Middleware
subtasks.description: Create middleware to validate SkyFi API keys.
subtasks.details: Develop middleware to check the validity of API keys against a database or predefined list.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with valid and invalid API keys.

subtasks.title: Implement Rate Limiting Middleware
subtasks.description: Use express-rate-limit to implement rate limiting.
subtasks.details: Integrate express-rate-limit to control the number of requests per user.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate high request rates to ensure limits are enforced.

subtasks.title: Configure TLS for Secure Communication
subtasks.description: Ensure all communications are secured with TLS.
subtasks.details: Set up TLS certificates and configure the server to use HTTPS.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify secure connections using tools like SSL Labs.

subtasks.title: Integrate Middleware into Application
subtasks.description: Integrate the developed middleware into the main application.
subtasks.details: Ensure middleware is correctly applied to all relevant routes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test application routes to confirm middleware is active.

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Testing
subtasks.description: Perform comprehensive security testing on middleware.
subtasks.details: Test middleware under various scenarios to ensure security and performance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use penetration testing tools to identify vulnerabilities.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider breaking down the TLS configuration into subtasks for certificate management and server configuration.

tasks.title: Implement Archive Search Tool
tasks.description: Develop the `search_archive` tool to allow AI agents to search for satellite imagery.
tasks.details:
1. Define the `search_archive` tool with parameters for location, date range, resolution, and other filters.
2. Implement the tool using the SkyFi API client to retrieve imagery data.
3. Handle errors such as invalid location and no results found.
tasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests to verify that the `search_archive` tool returns correct results and handles errors appropriately.

subtasks.title: Define Search Tool Parameters
subtasks.description: Specify parameters for location, date range, resolution, and filters.
subtasks.details: Create a detailed specification for the search tool parameters, ensuring they cover all necessary aspects for querying satellite imagery.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review parameter definitions with stakeholders.

subtasks.title: Integrate SkyFi API Client
subtasks.description: Use the SkyFi API client to retrieve imagery data.
subtasks.details: Implement the integration with the SkyFi API client, focusing on data retrieval for the specified parameters.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API client integration with mock data.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling
subtasks.description: Handle errors such as invalid location and no results found.
subtasks.details: Develop error handling logic to manage scenarios like invalid input and empty results.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests for error scenarios.

subtasks.title: Develop Search Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement the core search functionality using defined parameters and API integration.
subtasks.details: Build the search logic that processes input parameters and interacts with the API to fetch results.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality with various input scenarios.

subtasks.title: Create Unit Tests for Search Tool
subtasks.description: Develop unit tests to verify search tool functionality and error handling.
subtasks.details: Write comprehensive unit tests to ensure the search tool returns correct results and handles errors appropriately.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run unit tests and validate results against expected outcomes.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider expanding the error handling into separate subtasks for different error scenarios, such as network errors or invalid inputs.

tasks.title: Develop Pricing and Feasibility Tools
tasks.description: Implement tools for pricing estimation and order feasibility checks.
tasks.details:
1. Implement the `get_pricing_estimate` tool to calculate pricing based on image ID or tasking request.
2. Develop the `check_order_feasibility` tool to assess order viability.
3. Ensure detailed error messages for infeasible orders.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the tools with various input scenarios to ensure accurate pricing and feasibility assessments.

subtasks.title: Implement Pricing Estimation Tool
subtasks.description: Develop the `get_pricing_estimate` tool to calculate pricing based on image ID or tasking request.
subtasks.details: Create a function that takes image ID or tasking request as input and returns a pricing estimate.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various image IDs and tasking requests to ensure accurate pricing.

subtasks.title: Develop Order Feasibility Check Tool
subtasks.description: Create the `check_order_feasibility` tool to assess order viability.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to evaluate order parameters and determine feasibility.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with different order scenarios to ensure correct feasibility assessment.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Messaging for Infeasible Orders
subtasks.description: Ensure detailed error messages are provided for infeasible orders.
subtasks.details: Design error messages that clearly explain why an order is infeasible.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify error messages with infeasible order inputs.

subtasks.title: Integrate Pricing and Feasibility Tools
subtasks.description: Combine the pricing estimation and feasibility check tools into a cohesive system.
subtasks.details: Ensure seamless interaction between pricing and feasibility tools.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the integrated system with end-to-end scenarios.

subtasks.title: Conduct Comprehensive Testing
subtasks.description: Perform thorough testing of the pricing and feasibility tools.
subtasks.details: Execute test cases covering all functionalities and edge cases.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use automated tests and manual testing to validate tool performance.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider detailing the error messaging into subtasks for different types of infeasibility reasons.

tasks.title: Create Order Placement and Confirmation Workflow
tasks.description: Develop the order placement tool with user confirmation to ensure secure transactions.
tasks.details:
1. Implement the `place_order` tool requiring a user confirmation token.
2. Develop a critical flow to ensure pricing is confirmed before order placement.
3. Handle errors such as insufficient funds and token mismatches.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate order placement scenarios to verify that the workflow requires confirmation and handles errors correctly.

subtasks.title: Design Order Placement Workflow
subtasks.description: Design the workflow for order placement including user confirmation.
subtasks.details: Create a detailed flowchart outlining each step in the order placement process, including user confirmation and error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the flowchart with stakeholders to ensure completeness.

subtasks.title: Implement User Confirmation Token
subtasks.description: Develop the mechanism to require a user confirmation token during order placement.
subtasks.details: Add a token verification step in the order placement process to ensure user confirmation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate order placements with valid and invalid tokens to verify functionality.

subtasks.title: Develop Pricing Confirmation Step
subtasks.description: Ensure pricing is confirmed before order placement.
subtasks.details: Implement a step to verify and confirm pricing before proceeding with the order.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various pricing scenarios to ensure correct confirmation.

subtasks.title: Handle Insufficient Funds Error
subtasks.description: Implement error handling for insufficient funds during order placement.
subtasks.details: Add logic to detect and handle cases where the user has insufficient funds to place an order.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate orders with insufficient funds to test error handling.

subtasks.title: Handle Token Mismatch Error
subtasks.description: Implement error handling for token mismatches during order placement.
subtasks.details: Add logic to detect and handle cases where the user confirmation token does not match.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with mismatched tokens to verify error handling.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider expanding the error handling into separate subtasks for different types of errors, such as token mismatches or insufficient funds.

tasks.title: Implement Order Status and History Tools
tasks.description: Develop tools to check order status and retrieve order history for tracking purposes.
tasks.details:
1. Implement the `get_order_status` tool to provide order progress and details.
2. Develop the `list_orders` tool to retrieve a history of past orders.
3. Support polling for status updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the tools with various order scenarios to ensure accurate status reporting and history retrieval.

subtasks.title: Design Order Status Tool Interface
subtasks.description: Create a design for the `get_order_status` tool interface.
subtasks.details: Design the user interface for the `get_order_status` tool, ensuring it displays order progress and details clearly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review design with stakeholders for feedback.

subtasks.title: Implement `get_order_status` Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the backend functionality for the `get_order_status` tool.
subtasks.details: Implement the logic to retrieve and display order status using the existing API endpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various order IDs to ensure accurate status retrieval.

subtasks.title: Design Order History Tool Interface
subtasks.description: Create a design for the `list_orders` tool interface.
subtasks.details: Design the user interface for the `list_orders` tool, ensuring it lists past orders effectively.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review design with stakeholders for feedback.

subtasks.title: Implement `list_orders` Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the backend functionality for the `list_orders` tool.
subtasks.details: Implement the logic to retrieve and display a history of past orders using the existing API endpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various user accounts to ensure complete order history retrieval.

subtasks.title: Add Polling Support for Status Updates
subtasks.description: Implement polling to update order status in real-time.
subtasks.details: Develop a polling mechanism to periodically check for order status updates and refresh the display.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate order status changes to verify polling updates the status correctly.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider breaking down the polling support into subtasks for different update frequencies or mechanisms.

tasks.title: Develop AOI Monitoring Setup Tool
tasks.description: Create tools for setting up and managing area of interest (AOI) monitoring.
tasks.details:
1. Implement the `create_monitor` tool to set up monitoring with specified criteria.
2. Develop tools for listing and deleting monitors.
3. Implement webhook dispatch if native support is unavailable.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the monitoring setup and management tools to ensure correct functionality and notification dispatch.

subtasks.title: Implement 'create_monitor' Tool
subtasks.description: Develop the tool to set up monitoring with specified criteria.
subtasks.details: Create a function to initialize monitoring based on user-defined parameters such as location and frequency.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various criteria to ensure correct setup.

subtasks.title: Develop Monitor Listing Tool
subtasks.description: Create a tool to list all active monitors.
subtasks.details: Implement a function that retrieves and displays all current monitors from the database.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that all active monitors are listed accurately.

subtasks.title: Develop Monitor Deletion Tool
subtasks.description: Create a tool to delete specified monitors.
subtasks.details: Implement a function to remove monitors based on user input, ensuring proper cleanup of resources.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test deletion with valid and invalid monitor IDs.

subtasks.title: Implement Webhook Dispatch
subtasks.description: Develop webhook dispatch functionality if native support is unavailable.
subtasks.details: Create a mechanism to send notifications via webhooks when certain events occur in the monitoring system.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate events to ensure webhooks are dispatched correctly.

subtasks.title: Integrate and Test AOI Monitoring Tools
subtasks.description: Integrate all tools and perform end-to-end testing.
subtasks.details: Combine all developed tools into a cohesive system and conduct comprehensive testing to ensure functionality and reliability.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform end-to-end tests covering setup, listing, deletion, and notifications.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider expanding the webhook dispatch into subtasks for different event types or notification methods.

tasks.title: Write Comprehensive Documentation
tasks.description: Develop complete documentation for the MCP server, including API references and integration guides.
tasks.details:
1. Write detailed API documentation with examples for each tool.
2. Create integration guides for connecting AI agents like Claude and GPT.
3. Document deployment instructions and troubleshooting tips.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and clarity, and validate examples through testing.

subtasks.title: Draft API Documentation
subtasks.description: Create initial draft of API documentation with examples.
subtasks.details: Outline each API endpoint, parameters, and provide example requests and responses.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review draft for completeness and accuracy.

subtasks.title: Develop Integration Guides
subtasks.description: Create guides for integrating AI agents like Claude and GPT.
subtasks.details: Detail steps for connecting AI agents, including necessary configurations and code snippets.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test integration steps with AI agents to ensure accuracy.

subtasks.title: Document Deployment Instructions
subtasks.description: Write detailed deployment instructions for the MCP server.
subtasks.details: Include server setup, configuration, and deployment steps.
subtasks.testStrategy: Follow instructions to deploy a test server and verify functionality.

subtasks.title: Add Troubleshooting Tips
subtasks.description: Compile common issues and solutions for MCP server deployment and usage.
subtasks.details: Identify potential problems and provide solutions or workarounds.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate common issues and verify that solutions are effective.

subtasks.title: Finalize and Review Documentation
subtasks.description: Review and finalize the entire documentation for clarity and completeness.
subtasks.details: Ensure all sections are complete, clear, and well-organized.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct a peer review and test all examples and instructions.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Consider expanding the documentation into subtasks for different user roles or use cases.
